response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This exceptional item, which is worth $1,200,000 to you, is now available for purchase. I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, a significant discount that reflects my desire to see this valuable asset go to someone who appreciates its true worth.
